snippet: The Girl Scouts, with corporate help, are focusing on educating girls in leadership after surveys showed they lacked confidence in their abilities to rise to the top.
lead_paragraph: The Girl Scouts, with corporate help, are focusing on educating girls in leadership after surveys showed they lacked confidence in their abilities to rise to the top.

headline.seo: Girl Scouts Refocus Message on Leadership
headline.main: From Cookie Sales to Lessons in Leadership
headline.print_headline: From Cookie Sales to Lessons in Leadership
